医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究可能会带来用于早期检测皮肤状况的非侵入性光技术阿斯顿大学研究人员进行的一项研究表明，在偏振激光下检查时，老化皮肤的外观与年轻皮肤相比明显不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Study-could-lead-to-non-induced-light-based-techniques-for-early-detection-of-skin-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Study-could-lead-to-non-induced-light-based-techniques-for-early-detection-of-skin-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f9fe0f6-391a-4732-8b69-a61fc37a5eef Mon, 12 Feb 2024 11:17:46 -0500 Study could lead to non-invasive, light-based techniques for early detection of skin conditions
试验调查在线监督团体精神和身体康复计划对长期新冠患者的疗效研究人员评估了在线监督的团体精神和身体康复计划对长期感染新冠病毒的成年人的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Trial-investigates-efficacy-of-online-supervised-group-mental-and-physical-rehabilitation-program-for-long-COVID-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Trial-investigates-efficacy-of-online-supervised-group-mental-and-physical-rehabilitation-program-for-long-COVID-病人.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39048647-7cc6-478e-b79a-6cbc308de82f Mon, 12 Feb 2024 11:13:00 -0500 Trial investigates efficacy of online supervised group mental and physical rehabilitation program for long COVID patients
早教和托儿中心提供的膳食不符合国家饮食建议昆士兰大学的研究人员发现，一些社会经济地位较低的社区的早期教育和儿童保育中心提供的膳食不符合国家饮食建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Meals-provided-in-early-education-and-childcare-centers-do-not-meet-national-dietary-recommendations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Meals-provided-in-early-education-and-childcare-centers-do-not-meet-national-dietary-recommendations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=461a210d-7c57-4d48-bc8e-c8a582f8ab40 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 11:06:26 -0500 Meals provided in early education and childcare centers do not meet national dietary recommendations
新研究可能解释为什么早产儿的肺部对压力敏感许多早产儿需要机械通气来呼吸。然而，长时间通气可能会导致呼吸系统疾病或通气引起的损伤等问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/New-research-may-explain-why-premature-lungs-are-sensitive-to-stress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/New-research-may-explain-why-premature-lungs-are-sensitive-to-stress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfeed1bf-9a96-4e27-a9d1-02b989e82c22 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 10:00:42 -0500 New research may explain why premature lungs are sensitive to stress
CRISPR 可用于更快的猴痘检测Mpox，以前称为猴痘，是一种罕见的病毒性疾病，通过人与人之间的身体接触传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/CRISPR-could-be-used-for-faster-monkeypox-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/CRISPR-could-be-used-for-faster-monkeypox-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=250e8bd2-c1cc-4db0-9085-68dfe8ae8c09 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 09:57:33 -0500 CRISPR could be used for faster monkeypox testing
新研究显示基于尿液的检测有望检测卵巢癌弗吉尼亚联邦大学的 Joseph Reiner 及其同事的新研究显示了基于尿液的卵巢癌检测的前景。 Reiner 将在 2024 年 2 月 10 日至 14 日在宾夕法尼亚州费城举行的第 68 届生物物理学会年会上展示他们的研究成果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/New-research-shows-promise-for-urine-based-test-to-detect-ovarian-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/New-research-shows-promise-for-urine-based-test-to-detect-ovarian-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5af9a5e3-d940-4b7a-b8dd-c2b00a607192 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 09:54:45 -0500 New research shows promise for urine-based test to detect ovarian cancer
使用 3D 冰打印创建类似血管的结构目前美国有超过10万人需要器官移植。对心脏、肾脏和肝脏等器官的需求远远超过可用的供应，人们有时要等待数年才能收到捐赠的器官。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Using-3D-ice-printing-to-create-structs-that-resemble-blood-vessels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Using-3D-ice-printing-to-create-structs-that-resemble-blood-vessels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4767e4b8-0e5f-43fc-b8de-c0e92c4d11c0 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 09:52:21 -0500 Using 3D ice printing to create structures that resemble blood vessels
了解自然遗传变异如何促进对低氧的适应性反应人类仍在不断进化，加州大学医学院低氧生理基因组学中心创始人兼联合主任塔图姆·西蒙森博士计划利用进化来改善所有人的医疗保健。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Understanding-how-natural-genic-variation-contributes-to-adaptive-responses-to-low-oxygen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Understanding-how-natural-genic-variation-contributes-to-adaptive-responses-to-low-oxygen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30eaaef3-8b58-4f91-adde-96f916abfe2c Mon, 12 Feb 2024 09:48:48 -0500 Understanding how natural genetic variation contributes to adaptive responses to low oxygen
ARRALYZE® 推出 CellShepherd®：用于实时监测功能测定的完全自主单细胞平台ARRALYZE® 是 LPKF Laser & Electronics SE 的生命科学部门，自豪地宣布 CellShepherd® 投入商业使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/ARRALYZEc2ae-launches-CellShepherdc2ae-A-完全自主-single-cell-platform-for-real-time-monitoring-of-function-assays.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/ARRALYZEc2ae-launches-CellShepherdc2ae-A-完全自主-single-cell-platform-for-real-time-monitoring-of-function-assays.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03bd398a-4af9-43f5-9234-e445a0a10430 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 08:36:00 -0500 ARRALYZE® launches CellShepherd®: A fully autonomous single-cell platform for real-time monitoring of functional assays
研究发现，空军学员的营养知识与重力加速测试的成功有关营养知识、体力和活动以及身体成分与空军学员在重力加速测试（G 测试）期间是否失去意识有何关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Air-Force-cadets-nutrition-knowledge-linked-to-success-in-gravitational-acceleration-test-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Air-Force-cadets-nutrition-knowledge-linked-to-success-in-gravitational-acceleration-test-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=692fcd3a-14e7-4a5a-922c-5ec21dedda24 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 08:02:00 -0500 Air Force cadets' nutrition knowledge linked to success in gravitational acceleration test, study finds
